title: Bonus Episode: Errol Morris on ‘Dr. Strangelove,’ Donald Trump, LSD, and America
description:
The legendary documentarian Errol Morris has a new film called 'My Psychedelic Love Story' premiering on Showtime this week. He returns to the show to talk with Sean about a wide array of topics, from psychedelics to psychotics.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Errol Morris
